### Decisions from experience

<p align="left">
  <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dwulff/SI2021_DfE/master/_sessions/_image/drosophila.png" width=480px style="height:80px">
</p>

<div style="width:480px;padding:5px;background-color: #FAD7A0;">

#### Interactive 1 - Paradigm (10min)

Go to this <a href="https://taming-uncertainty.mpib-berlin.mpg.de/chapter-7-element-1">**site**</a> to try out risky choices based on experience and description. 
</div>

<div style="width:480px;padding:5px;margin-top:10px;background-color: #FAD7A0">

#### Interactive 2 - Mechanisms (20min)

Go to this <a href="https://taming-uncertainty.mpib-berlin.mpg.de/chapter-7-element-2">**site**</a> to explore the cognitive underpinnings of decisions from experience. 

When you think you have found the best mix of cognitive components go to this <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc7Xrw6d8XdZR1D5bl1Aqwr-6fcEwarEqOwgNx0RGgPiQtm3w/viewform?usp=sf_link">**questionnarie**</a> to enter your predictions.

</div>
